00121 } else {
00122     ob_start();
00123     // table spec
00124     $table_spec = 'loan AS l
00125     LEFT JOIN member AS m ON l.member_id=m.member_id
00126     LEFT JOIN item AS i ON l.item_code=i.item_code
00127     LEFT JOIN biblio AS b ON i.biblio_id=b.biblio_id';
00128 
00129     // create datagrid
00130     $reportgrid = new report_datagrid();
00131     $reportgrid->setSQLColumn('m.member_id AS \''.__('Member ID').'\'',
00132         'm.member_name AS \''.__('Member Name').'\'',
00133         'l.item_code AS \''.__('Item Code').'\'',
00134         'b.title AS \''.__('Title').'\'',
00135         'l.loan_date AS \''.__('Loan Date').'\'',
00136         'l.due_date AS \''.__('Due Date').'\'', 'l.is_return AS \''.__('Loan Status').'\'');
00137     $reportgrid->setSQLorder('l.loan_date DESC');
00138 
00139     $criteria = 'm.member_id IS NOT NULL ';
00140     if (isset($_GET['id_name']) AND !empty($_GET['id_name'])) {
00141         $id_name = $dbs->escape_string($_GET['id_name']);
00142         $criteria .= ' AND (m.member_id LIKE \'%'.$id_name.'%\' OR m.member_name LIKE \'%'.$id_name.'%\')';
00143     }
00144     if (isset($_GET['title']) AND !empty($_GET['title'])) {
00145         $keyword = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['title']));
00146         $words = explode(' ', $keyword);
00147         if (count($words) > 1) {
00148             $concat_sql = ' AND (';
00149             foreach ($words as $word) {
00150                 $concat_sql .= " (b.title LIKE '%$word%') AND";
00151             }
00152             // remove the last AND
00153             $concat_sql = substr_replace($concat_sql, '', -3);
00154             $concat_sql .= ') ';
00155             $criteria .= $concat_sql;
00156         } else {
00157             $criteria .= ' AND b.title LIKE \'%'.$keyword.'%\'';
00158         }
00159     }
00160     if (isset($_GET['itemCode']) AND !empty($_GET['itemCode'])) {
00161         $item_code = $dbs->escape_string(trim($_GET['itemCode']));
00162         $criteria .= ' AND i.item_code=\''.$item_code.'\'';
00163     }
00164     // loan date
00165     if (isset($_GET['startDate']) AND isset($_GET['untilDate'])) {
00166         $criteria .= ' AND (TO_DAYS(l.loan_date) BETWEEN TO_DAYS(\''.$_GET['startDate'].'\') AND
00167             TO_DAYS(\''.$_GET['untilDate'].'\'))';
00168     }
00169     // loan status
00170     if (isset($_GET['loanStatus']) AND $_GET['loanStatus'] != 'ALL') {
00171         $loanStatus = (integer)$_GET['loanStatus'];
00172         $criteria .= ' AND is_return='.$loanStatus;
00173     }
00174     if (isset($_GET['recsEachPage'])) {
00175         $recsEachPage = (integer)$_GET['recsEachPage'];
00176         $num_recs_show = ($recsEachPage >= 20 && $recsEachPage <= 200)?$recsEachPage:$num_recs_show;
00177     }
00178     $reportgrid->setSQLCriteria($criteria);
00179 
00180    // callback function to show loan status
00181     function loanStatus($obj_db, $array_data)
00182     {
00183         if ($array_data[6] == 0) {
00184             return '<strong>'.__('On Loan').'</strong>';
00185         } else {
00186             return __('Returned');
00187         }
00188     }
00189     // modify column value
00190     $reportgrid->modifyColumnContent(6, 'callback{loanStatus}');
00191 
00192     // put the result into variables
00193     echo $reportgrid->createDataGrid($dbs, $table_spec, $num_recs_show);
00194 
00195     echo '<script type="text/javascript">'."\n";
00196     echo 'parent.$(\'pagingBox\').update(\''.str_replace(array("\n", "\r", "\t"), '', $reportgrid->paging_set).'\');'."\n";
00197     echo '</script>';
00198 
00199     $content = ob_get_clean();
00200     // include the page template
00201     require SENAYAN_BASE_DIR.'/admin/'.$sysconf['admin_template']['dir'].'/printed_page_tpl.php';
00202 }
00203 ?>
